Description:
--------------
Racing game licensed from the popular Ferrari brand, which includes several new cars, tracks and a new career mode, among others. The Wii will deliver the possibility to drive the Ferrari 458 Italy and the inclusion of a career mode with three classes (GT Race, GT Road and Classics).
